scripts.start: mkdir -p build/debug/src; cp src/services/auth.yaml build/debug/src; DEBUG=engine*,svc:*  tsc-watch --onSuccess "node node_modules/@frogfish/kona/engine -c service.yaml --root $PWD/build/debug/src"
scripts.dist: npm version patch && cat package.json | jq -r .version > latest && git add latest && git commit -m $(cat latest) && rm -rf build/release && mkdir -p build/release && gulp build; cd build/release; npm publish --access public; git push origin master
